thread.title: Macron plays down few big deals during China visit

title: Macron plays down few big deals during China visit
text:
Macron plays down few big deals during China visit 4:29pm IST - 01:43 
On the final leg of his three-day visit to China, French President Emmanuel Macron urged leaders from other European Union countries to be more careful about the assets they allow to be taken over, while playing down few big deals made during his trip.   
On the final leg of his three-day visit to China, French President Emmanuel Macron urged leaders from other European Union countries to be more careful about the assets they allow to be taken over, while playing down few big deals made during his trip.  //reut.rs/2ALmMSz
